feed.title: Category: lecture | Introduction to Aerial Robotics

entry.title: the course
entry.content:
Welcome to ENGR 1501: Introduction to Aerial Robotics. This post will go over the course’s objectives, expectations, and structure, discuss some motivations for studying robotics, and give a brief overview of the structure of the quadcopter we’ll be building in the first few weeks. We’ll get started with the syllabus.

Syllabus:

The syllabus can be found here; this will be where the most up to date version lives throughout the semester. Aside from the topic listing, which we’ll discuss later, the most important parts of the syllabus can be summed up as follows:
